name: Tiled Group 4 Raster Image File
summary: Learn about .TG4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TG4 is the native format used by ImageCenter and Image Machines software.

description: Raster image format used by Bentley Systems software, also known as a "Type 24" file; saved as a 1-bit tiled image file compressed with RLE compression; supports multiple resolutions.
